 2017-08942017-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  VAC
ActVeterans Review and Appeal Board Act
PrecisReappointment of THOMAS W. JARMYN of Stratford, Prince Edward Island, as a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board and his designation as interim Chairperson, effective July 2, 2017, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed.
AttachmentsAttachment
